short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy branch names easily in Azure DevOps

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In Azure DevOps the pull request page does not offer buttons to copy the source and target branch names. This extension adds those buttons.
